titleInfo.title: Dissipative corrections to particle spectra and anisotropic flow from a saddle-point approximation to kinetic freeze out

mods.abstract: A significant fraction of the changes in momentum distributions induced bydissipative phenomena in the description of the fluid fireball created inultrarelativistic heavy ion collisions are actually taking place when the fluidturns into individual particles. We study these corrections in the limit of alow freeze-out temperature of the flowing medium, and show that they mostlyaffect particles with a higher velocity than the fluid. For these, we deriverelations between different flow harmonics, from which the functional form ofthe dissipative corrections could ultimately be reconstructed from experimentaldata.
